{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/title|getloc}}
{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/navbar}}
{{ddcl |
std::locale getloc() const;
}}

Returns the associated locale.

The associated locale is the value supplied to {{lc|pubimbue()}} on the last call, or, if that function has not been called, the value of the global locale ({{lc|std::locale}}) at the time of the construction of the streambuf.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The associated locale.

===Example===
{{example |
 | code=
 | output=
}}
